price: Warum bringst du uns nicht die Engel, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst?
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
